fields.name: Alignment:
fields.value:
Town Investigative
Attack: None

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select three or more people to start recording the rhythm of. The order of those people will then be randomized.
> Each night, including the one you used this ability on, you will learn the Sheriff's result of the first person in the set. Next night, you'll learn the result of the next person in the set, etc. Upon reaching the last person, it'll loop back to the beginning.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You can be recording the rhythm of multiple sets of people at a time. You'll be able to differentiate each set.
